评论详情: So cute…bought a size smaller and so glad I did. Looks great with a cute pair of boots and jean jacket.
I wear this set at least once every two weeks. It’s soft and comfortable. Style is super cute and withstands all its weekly washes. Would be perfect as a travel set.

The pants in this set are fine but as other reviews state the top fits oddly. It would look better if it were a little bigger. The fabric is iffy. I don’t know how well it will hold up.  I would wear this around the house.
Cute set for the price. Bought after seeing on Instagram and was just as pictured
I bought this in brown and likes it so much I ordered the black. True to size and doesn’t shrink in the washer and dryer.
Love this set! Super soft, great quality, and super comfortable.

I saw this on an influencer and had to have it. I’ve worn it several times and I love it. I will definitely be grabbing multiple colors. The comfort and the fit are perfect. Can’t beat this amazing style.
Very comfortable. Easy set to throw on and go. Perfect for work or at home.
Very good quality and fit but my dog’s fur is all over and it.  For some reason my normal lint roller doesn’t take it off either.  Something to consider before buying.
Love this two piece set. Perfect to dress up or dress down. True size medium , will definitely order more in different colors.
I’ve gotten so many compliments on these! Great quality and super comfortable. Tempted to get another color!

I love this set. It has a relaxed fit and I love the capped sleeves. I got the black I am considering getting the green too. The material is soft and ribbed. As others have said it is a bit heavier than expected. It's more of a transition piece summer to fall fall to winter. I love how it fits and looks. I'm very happy with the set. To me the quality for the price is great. I got a large as I like it to be relaxed in the fit. I am 5'6 140 40C for reference.

Love the way this fits and feels.  Make sure you order this brand--I ordered two others (cheaper) and they looked horrible (and i returned them).  I ordered the large--I'm 5'4", 150#, hour-glass with wide hips.  Looks great!  Will order in one or two more colors.
Package was missing the top. Only received pants. Returning.
This is so flattering on and i was pleasantly surprised how versatile this set would be.  This washed and dried nicely and is very comfortable! Love this set!
Fits true to size my favorite two piece

I’m 5’10 around 180 and always have problems finding lounge pants long enough and these types of shirts long enough. This one is perfect. Shirt is a little short but it’s supposed to be, still enough for me to tuck in the front a little. Such a versatile set! Wore the shirt with jeans and was cute and paired the pants with a different shirt and still cute! Will be buying every color.

The fabric feels like luxury fabric and the texture in the fabric hides any imperfections in my legs. I am loving wearing them. Have basically worn them every day. I found them to be true to size. The top seems really over sized, which I think is the style. If you have larger upper arms, you will really like this set. I don't have large upper arms, so they are a bit loosie-goosie, but I can fix that easily on my sewing machine if it bothers me. So far I have just worn them for 5 days in a row and I get tons of compliments. My favorite part is the waist band. It's thick and substantial. None of me is rolling up and over the top of this waist band like I do with many other sets. I will buy this set in a few colors.
True to size. Washes very well! Highly recommend. So comfortable too! Cute outfit. Perfect for casual shopping.
Love this set!! So cute on. Waist a little tight but I did a little tuck in with front of shirt and it looked fine. Got medium
I love this lounge set! It’s super comfortable and has pockets in the pants that hold my iPhone without causing them to slid down. The shorter sleeves on the top are perfect for fall weather too!

I don’t know why I’m surprised but I was a skeptic and it came today, I immediately tried it on and I’m obsessed. Now I need it in every color. I’m 5’4 165-170lbs, large was perfect, big enough that if it shrinks I’m ok, but not too big if it doesn’t shrink, I’m still ok!! Comfortable as anything, breathable, but can cozy it up! Perfect transition to fall and even into winter!! Will 💯 get other colors 🙌🏼🙌🏼🙌🏼
Absolutely love this set. The material is a good weight and sits/drapes perfectly. I am 5’7” 143 pounds and ordered the small. Give it a try!
Material Soft and Comfortable
True to size . I am 6 foot 180 pounds I ordered an extra large and I should’ve ordered a large. The material is great not cheap at all very long.
So cute and very comfy

评论概述: Super comfy and soft - like wearing pajamas
评论详情: This outfit has now become my go to outfit for whenever I fly. It looks sophisticated and casual but is also super comfy to wear. The fabric is soft and the design is loose but also fitted in the right places so it doesn't look too much like pajamas. I highly recommend and I definitely want it in other colors.
Love this set, so comfy while also being cute!!

评论概述: A little heavy for everyday wear.
评论详情: The comfort is great, but the outfit as a whole is bit heavy for everyday wear.  Great for airline travel in winter.
This outfit is comfortable, fits well, it has a flattering fit, and the fabric is good quality. It is a little heavier fabric that is warm and does not stretch out.

Love this top and pant set. Cute with top tucked in the front or left out. Comfortable and trendy. True to size. I ordered a large which is my normal size. 5’4” and 195 lbs. if you’re on the fence, get it. Great for a girls day out, dinner, a cruise, etc. cute travel outfit as well. Fabric is thick but not too thick. Worth the price.

Easy drip.  I love that slouchy, rumbled, fell out of bed and into a great outfit aesthetic. I also love lounging in my pajamas well last reasonable pajama time. This little two piece gives me both serotonin boosts.  Easy to wear. Dressed up for a street water look or played down for the couch. Owning the attitude and the right bag will make both possible.  Breathable and breezy. The fabric has a good drape and ease of movement. The colors are deep and pigmented. The seams and stitches are secure.  And pockets!! Actually roomy and functional pockets.
Very comfortable, fits well, hand washed separately (cold) with no fading. Good value for the money.

I am always looking for cute, comfortable two-piece sets. They make me feel put together and are easy to wear. I loved the green on this set and the color was true in person. However, I did not like the fit or texture of this set. The bottoms were not that bad, but the seams on the arms of the top were awkward and not flattering. I felt like I was wearing pajamas. If you are looking for something cooler to wear around the house, this would be a good option. I just didn't feel like it was flattering or comfortable on me.
I gave them to someone as a gift.she was very please with the fit.

I bought this item at the beginning to wear it in the summer when for running errands but after noticing that the fabric is so thick I will recommend using it more for the winter or as a pajama. The style looks more like a pajama than a casual running-out errands outfit. The color that I picked it's a very dark royal blue and I will say that if will go better as sleepwear. Nothing chic and elegant about it.
Love the color. The fabric feels good. Great fit and very comfy! Going to order another set in a different color!

This is an easy outfit to wear almost anywhere! It's very comfortable, soft and stylish too. Just add sandal's or cute tennis shoes and a crossover bag and you're good to go run around town & out to lunch! It's a must have casual quick outfit when you want comfort and cuteness!

Made mistake in keeping this item. Kept because I thought I would really like it. Fabric too thick, scratchy even after washing. Hung up to dry. I was looking for something to wear in house only. Will go with first instinct next time.

I was very skeptical that these would actually fit my overweight butt, because sizes always seem to run small these days to the point that you can order a supposed XXXL, only for what arrives to be something that would barely fit a ten year old... so I'm used to being frustrated and having to return most clothes I order that aren't from companies actually SPECIALIZING in plus sizes... but I'm happy to report that not only do these fit, but they fit COMFORTABLY! It's certainly not the most attractive outfit out there or anything, but it's perfect for "just lounging around the house" sort of days -- a step above PJs, but just barely, and they still let you enjoy that pajamas kind of comfort.  So far they hold up well in the wash too, even when they accidentally got thrown in with my bedding and went through on a hot cycle. The cut of the sleeves is a little odd, I think I'd prefer regular t-shirt style sleeves than these that are more like halfway between tshirt and sleeveless, but they're still perfectly fine the way they are. The fabric is a bit on the thicker and heavier side, which is perfect for colder days, but it's still loose enough and breathable enough to handle somewhat warmer temperatures as well. All in all, a pretty decent little set.

The fabric of this set is a bit on the heavy side, but the set is really cute. I love the cut of the sleeves. Be aware that the bottom of the pants has a cuff around the ankle rather than being open like a lot of pajama pants. I love that kind of fit so I am very happy with it, but some people might not like how snug it feels. I would love to get them in a soft pink for my daughter!
This set is great. It’s a medium weight fabric. It is perfect for lounging or dog walks or errands. I love the ribbed look.
I ordered this outfit based on an influencers review. It is 100% worth it! I get tons of compliments, and it is so comfy!  10/10 would recommend, And probably will buy in more colors.
This outfit is so adorable and super comfy. Made with good quality material, not to heavy and could be worn for multiple occasions. Fits true to size and worth the value.

Clothing can be extremely hit or miss on Amazon. This is a definite win!! It is so flattering and cozy!! Flowy and the shirt is a great length on me. I am 5’2” so the pants are a little longer and baggy but not bad. The pants are draw strings so they are adjustable. The brown is such a good color. I’ve washed this set multiple times and still looks good as new!! I definite buy!
I would have liked this lighter weight so I could wear it in hot weather. Fit is great

I was very surprised by this - in a good way! So many leisure-type garments are made of thin, clingy material. Not this one! The fabric has weight and thickness to it. I love the ribbing, too. And the fabric has a (very) slight sheen to it, which is pretty. Plus, the set fit perfectly! The proportions are just right. One note: the pants might not be long enough for a tall person. I am 5'4" and they are perfect on me. Again - a nice surprise for someone of shorter stature. The color is beautiful, too. I have washed this set once, and was happy to see that it came out of the dryer looking new.
This outfit is so comfortable that I bought 2 more.  I'm 5'9 and around 158 lbs, and the pants length comes to my ankles, not too short.  The outfit looks just like it does on the model.
The quality of this set was average. Color mostly matched the picture. Way too big and bulky for a petite person. Material was comfortable.
I like all these knit sets, these are more like t shirt material than sweater material compared to the others. Which is good right now it's getting warmer and I can keep wearing these.

评论概述: Big armholes that help you cool down but also show your armpits
评论详情: This set is super comfortable and great for a workout. But the sleeves are barely sleeves and have huge armholes. Will definitely show your armpits and maybe a peek of sports bra. Not knocking the review down because I think it is a design choice to help keep you cool. But if you don’t like that sort of thing, now you know.

评论概述: Bit thicker fabric than I was expecting
评论详情: The fabric is a bit heavier than I was thinking they would be which was a bit of a surprise. It was also ribbed which was a bit annoying as I was expecting it to be smooth fabric. It has held up rather well with wearing and washing, and the color has not faded yet.

I love them! I think they are so cute and so comfortable. I did end up sizing up to a large when I am normally a medium and it was perfect. For reference, I am 5’8 and sometimes the pants are too short in sets. I actually think it is really flattering set with a bit of a baggy feel. I love the color, it is just as advertised. I would definitely recommend.

The dark green color of this 2-pice outfit is very nice. That being said, the knit is not like a sweater knit, nor like a Ponte or sweatshirt style knit fabric. Instead, it is more akin to a thin t-shirt material that's a bit clingy. Runs small and shrank a bit when laundered, so consider ordering up.

I absolutely love this! it’s soft, comfy stylish. I just love everything about it. It’s comfy wear but still nice enough that you look like you tried to put yourself together like you put some thought into it. It has a little bit of weight to it, but not too much that it’s going to make you uncomfortably hot. The fabric is butter soft. I am obsessed with the color. This is going to be my new favorite Friday casual wear outfit. True to size 170lbs large 5‘6“.

I'm disappointed in this track suit as it is not good for wearing in the summer as the material is heavier than expected.  I don't find the material to be breathable.  It is most definitely ribbed material.  One thing I do appreciate is the opening at the sleeves is not overly large, it is just the right size with the finished opening.  The drawstring waist is good for adjusting to just the right tightness.  I just wish this was more breathable and lightweight to wear this summer but will be wearing it in the fall with cooler temperatures.
Very cute and comfortable to wear. Flattering and great value.  Material is medium to heavier.

评论概述: Nice but fabric is very heavy.
评论详情: I ordered this to wear around the house.  I really like the style but the fabric is very heavy!  I weighed this outfit and it weighs over 2 lbs!  That being said the fabric is very nice and soft.  This outfit washes well with no wrinkles and I even dried it in the dryer and it did not shrink.  I will wear this around the house and see if it works like a weighted vest!  The outfit is cute, durable and washes well. It has an average price tag for clothing of this quality.  I would recommend this outfit but be aware of the weight.

I did order up a size. I would typically order a medium but since this is lounge like, I ordered a large.  The material is heavy but not thick.  It holds shape nicely. It doesn’t stretch out and look sloppy as you wear it. The shirt is good length, and fits well.  The pants have a thick elastic band that stays put. (It is tighter than I expected but not uncomfortable.) The drawstrings really work if needed. I love the look and feel. I think the quality and value align.

评论概述: Super Cute Track Suit Is Very Stylish and Quality Made.
评论详情: I ordered the BTFBM Women's Two Piece Tracksuit Short Sleeve Tops Long Pants With Drawstring Outfits Jogger Sets in brown. I really am happy I ordered this jogger set. It’s well made and is different from many of the ones I’ve seen this fashion season. I love the slight ribbing that adds dimension and structure in the pants and ends  with a cuffed leg. The pants also have a thick and heavy corded drawstring that looks veřy stylish. The shirt has the same ribbing that helps elongate my figure and has cute short sleeves that adds a sporty vibe to the track suit. Right now it’s chilly in my part of the country so I added a brown crop style jacket /hoodie and i got so many compliments on my outfit! Besides looking like a fashionista the jogger set is very Cozy and comfy… One of my favorite outfits of this season for style AND comfort!
I love this set! It's super comfy and the perfect garments to wear lounging or for picking up the kids. The color is also really nice
The material is pretty heavy. I will use this for cooler days.  The arm holes are large so I will just use this for loungewear

Lovely little track suit set that is very thin and comfortable. Breathes well and the stitching is great. I got many complements when wearing it. The color was true to the picture as well as the sizing worked and fit great. Price is good and you cant go wrong when looking for something comfy to lounge in and hang out.

I adore this set.  I wear it exactly as advertised with the shirt loosely tucked in at the front and it's SO COMFORTABLE! It's meant to have a baggier/oversized feel for ultimate lounging.  I love that about it.  The pants are super cute and I love the drop shoulder on the shirt.  Overall I think this is an excellent value for the price.  It's one of those sets that you can wear around the house or slip on some cute runners or sandals to run some errands.  Loving the versatility and the comfort.

Currently wearing this as a lounge set and it's perfect! I ordered a size small (5'3, 128 lbs) and it fit perfectly. It's a little baggy/oversized which is excellent. The fabric is on the thicker side. Pocket in the front is a great little detail. HAS POCKETS!!! I repeat, HAS POCKETS!! Waist band is comfortable with drawstrings and cute little metal pieces on the end just to add a little flare. These are perfect for comfort travel, lounging, or just an every day outfit!

评论概述: Comfortable and Stylish Women's Two Piece Tracksuit - Perfect for Daily Wear and Workouts!
评论详情: I recently purchased the BTFBM Women's Two Piece Tracksuit Short Sleeve Tops Long Pants with Drawstring Outfits Jogger Sets for my wife, and I must say, we were both extremely impressed with the quality and fit of this product!  The tracksuit is made of a soft and breathable fabric that is perfect for both daily wear and workout sessions.  The short sleeve top and long pants provided enough flexibility, and the drawstring feature in the pants ensured a secure and adjustable fit. My wife also loved the trendy design and look of the tracksuit, making her feel both cozy and stylish at the same time.  Not only was the fit true to size, but the range of colors available allowed me to pick the perfect shade of brown for my wife, which she absolutely adored. Since receiving the tracksuit, she has used it frequently for her daily walks and gym sessions, and she has mentioned that it provides her adequate support and freedom of movement during her workouts.  The quality of stitching and finishing was top-notch, and the tracksuit has maintained its shape and color even after multiple washes. It is definitely a durable addition to her wardrobe that can be mixed and matched with other pieces as well.  I highly recommend the BTFBM Women's Two Piece Tracksuit for anyone looking for a comfortable, stylish, and durable outfit perfect for daily wear or work out sessions. The price is reasonable, and the quality is exceptional. It would also make a fantastic gift for a friend or loved one!

This is a very nice piece to lounge around the house and, I love the drawstring pants. I also love a dark jogging suit. This is something that is easy to dress down with tennis shoes, or dress up with a nice sandal.
The fabric has a heavy and soft feel. The color is really nice. I'm excited to have a new comfy lounge set. I'm a fan!
This set is such a comfortable loungewear set it runs true to size but when in doubt I'd size up

评论概述: Super soft comfy pants, shirt a bit large
评论详情: I'm so glad the pants fit and are not too large. Anytime you order these sets it's hard to get the size right, unless you can order a medium pants and small top, which would have been ideal. Either way these pants are super soft, well made and hit just at the ankle. I did think they'd be too long so was pleasantly surprised when I saw they were not, as I'm 5'2".  The top was way too big so I'll wear the pants alone and maybe the top as a layering option.
